description:
Creates an empty directory under the specified path

Example:
1. "/home/user1/newdir"@0 received on `path`
2/a. "/home/user1/newdir"@0 sent on `created` if directory has been successfully created
2/b. "/home/user1/newdir"@0 sent on `bounced` if any error occured during directory creation

a2fd7842-f43c-4897-934f-fa2fd0cc89aa.description:
Receives the path of the  directory to create.

Example:
"/home/user1/newdir"

(To keep the application portable use "/" as path separator.)
a2fd7842-f43c-4897-934f-fa2fd0cc89aa.name: path

63483514-7af9-4b11-9f73-475da4c3dd7c.description: Sends the path if the operation has succeeded
63483514-7af9-4b11-9f73-475da4c3dd7c.name: created

9d680e45-3011-4727-b8e3-41c0dc450f8f.description: Sends the path if the operation has failed.
9d680e45-3011-4727-b8e3-41c0dc450f8f.name: bounced

062c5d6b-8e47-4dd0-8419-c0a8e65e489b.name: error

name: io/file/Directory creator
